adhikaranaye pradhaniyata erehi winaya parikshanayak digin digatama adenawa nam eya rate sthawara bhawayata haniyak.abhiyachanadhikaranaye kandawimata anuwa therim karaka sabhawe wipakshaye niyojithayan adhikaranaya idiriye peni sitima waradak wanne keseda?parlimenthuwe siduwu yam katayuththak sambandhayen ho karaka sabhawaka siduwu yam katayuththak sambandhayen pitasthara parshawayak idiriye sakshi dimata katayuthu karanne nam ee manthriwaraya ho niladhariya parlimenthuwe wishesha awasarayak laba gatha yuthuyi.ese awasaraya nomathiwa sakshi dimata kriya kirima 17 weni waganthiya ullanghanaya kirimak.

ehidi ee sambandhayen adhyapanaya pilibanda wisheshagnya danumak athi esema dakmakda sahitha piris sambandha kara ganimin sayitam aayathanaye pawathna awidhimathbhawaya sahithawama eya pawathwagena yamata adhikarana niyogaya kadathurawak kara ganimata ida nodi eya pamanak nowa danata pawathna kothalawala waidya pitayada athuluwa anagathayedi athi wimata niyamitha usas adhyapana aayathanada wishwa widyala pa්rathipadana komisame niyamanayata yatath karana aakaraye (ee samagama eki komisamada wada diyunu aayathanayak bawata path kirimata athi badha iwath karamin) wada piliwelak sakasima saha rate pudgalika adhyapanaya kaluu kada wyaparayaka thaththwayen mudawa sadharana gasthu ka්ramayakata yatath karana wada piliwelak gana madihath wima ada awashyathawa wi thibe.
palath palana mathiwaranayedi aanduwa wetha janathawa wisin di athi paniwudaya piligena wahama aanduwata illa aswana lesa eekabadda wipakshaya illa siti.
sisun wetha yawa athi lipiye sandahan ayuru owunta jathika wishwa widyala paddhathiye thanak labimata puluwan athara ewita mema wada satahana sampurna kala bawata sahathikayak idiripathkala yuthuya.

manda babiloniye wasiyan thama maligawata kala deta danduwam dimak lesa+ babiloniya winasha kara damimata yehowa dewi aramunu kaleya.+ ee sandaha yehowa dewi mediya jathika rajawarunwa pelambaewweya.+ 12 babiloniye pawuru desata man salakunak thabanna.+ thawa thawath murakaruwan yodawa murakawal wadi karanna.+ manga raka pahara dimata sarasi sitinna.+ babiloniyata wiruddhawa kriya kirima yehowa dewige aramuna nisa ohu ehi wasiyanta wiruddhawa prakasha kala de aniwaryayenma itu karanneya.”+ 13 “babiloniya, yasa isuren pohosath,+ jala dhara madhyayaye sitina+ obe awasanaya atha langayi.+ boho seyin labha ipayu obe isurumath yugaye awasanaya kara oba dan pamina thibe.+ 14 ‘palangati ranchuwak men wu wishala senangak mama oba wethata ewannemi.+ owuhu obawa parajaya kara jaya ghosha nanganu atha’+ kiya swargaye senawala adhipathi wana yehowa dewi thama namin diwura pawasuweya.+ 15 dewi thama mahath balayen polowa sada+ pragnyawen+ eya sthira lesa pihitewweya.+ ohu thama nuwanin+ ahasthalaya athirillak men digahariyeya.+ 16 ohuge handata ahaskusehi athi jala kanda gigurum deyi.
